subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: West Virginia non-coaching staff members worked with players in violation of N.C.A.A. limits during the Rich Rodriguez era and under the current coach, Bill Stewart, according to N.C.A.A. allegations.
snippet: West Virginia non-coaching staff members worked with players in violation of N.C.A.A. limits during the Rich Rodriguez era and under the current coach, Bill Stewart, according to N.C.A.A. allegations.
